dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Dr. David Miller, the president, mentioned they had almost 300 Covid patients at one point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dr. David Miller, the president, mentioned they had almost three hundred Covid patients at one point.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Weve had almost up to 300 Covid patients at a time with 30% in an ICU, says President Dr. Ray Watts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and 30% of those were in the ICU—that's an intense load for any hospital to handle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and thirty percent of those were in the I C U-that's an intense load for any hospital to handle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Weve had almost up to 300 Covid patients at a time with 30% in an ICU, says President Dr. Ray Watts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he really emphasized the resilience of the employees, you know, working under that kind of stress without complaint.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he really emphasized the resilience of the employees, you know, working under that kind of stress without complaint.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They have done it without complaint. The resilience of our employees during these times of greater stress had been remarkable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's no surprise they ended up ranking second on Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers for 2021.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's no surprise they ended up ranking second on Forbes' list of America's Best Large Employers for twenty twenty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions, among other initiatives, helped UAB secure the top spot on Forbes list of Americas Best Large Employers 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? They provided ample protective gear and mental health resources, even a wellness app developed at the university.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? They provided ample protective gear and mental health resources, even a wellness app developed at the university.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To ensure their health this past year, Watts says all employees have been supplied with ample personal protective gear. All employees were also given access to mental health resources, including a mental wellness app developed at the university.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And that $8,000 grant for employees who buy or renovate homes nearby—that's a pretty unique benefit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that eight thousand dollars grant for employees who buy or renovate homes nearby-that's a pretty unique benefit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a means of investing in its employees and the vitality of its campus neighboring towns, every employee who buys or renovates a home in the surrounding area is given an $8,000 grant, he says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and that contact-tracing app, GuideSafe, developed by UAB faculty—hundreds of thousands used it around the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and that contact-tracing app, GuideSafe, developed by U A B faculty-hundreds of thousands used it around the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last summer, UAB faculty developed a contact-tracing app called GuideSafe, which notifies users if they have been within six feet of another user who has tested positive for Covid-19. Hundreds of thousands of people not only in Alabama but around the country have used this, he says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, Amazon actually took the number one spot on that same Forbes list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, Amazon actually took the number one spot on that same Forbes list.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions, among other initiatives, helped UAB secure the top spot on Forbes list of Americas Best Large Employers 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, with benefits like unlimited paid parental leave and up to $25,000 for fertility or adoption support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, with benefits like unlimited paid parental leave and up to twenty five thousand dollars for fertility or adoption support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though Netflix co-CEO Reed Hastings was famously quoted last fall as saying he isnt a fan of remote work, his companys benefits packagewhich includes unlimited paid parental leave (though new parents typically take between four and eight months) and $75,000 to support fertility, surrogacy or adoptionaffords employees ample work-life balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They also offered meditation apps and education reimbursements for employees' kids during the pandemic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They also offered meditation apps and education reimbursements for employees' kids during the pandemic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the streaming service has offered customers a cure to their pandemic boredom, its offered employees access to mindfulness app Headspace and text-based coaching platform Ginger. Netflix also recently introduced an education reimbursement of up to $6,000 for employees children during the pandemic, this in addition to covering the cost of child, elder, adult or even pet backup care for up to 10 days through Care.com in the U.S.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But you know, UAB wasn't alone—Yale, University of Michigan, Ohio State's medical center all made the top 20.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you know, U A B wasn't alone-Yale, University of Michigan, Ohio State's medical center all made the top twenty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: UAB isnt the only university to rank highly: the top 20 includes Yale University (No. 5), the University of Maryland, Baltimore (No. 13), Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center (No. 14), the University of Arizona (No. 16), the University of Michigan (No. 17) and the University at Buffalo (No. 19).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The survey was huge too—50,000 Americans rating their employers anonymously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The survey was huge too-fifty thousand Americans rating their employers anonymously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To determine the list, Statista surveyed 50,000 Americans working for businesses with at least 1,000 employees. All the surveys were anonymous, allowing participants to openly share their opinions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about what really makes a workplace stand out during such a tough time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about what really makes a workplace stand out during such a tough time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure—it's not just about pay, it's about feeling supported, um, especially in healthcare or essential work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure-it's not just about pay, it's about feeling supported, um, especially in healthcare or essential work.

artist_script:
The bustling corridors of the University of Alabama at Montgomery Hospital, a year into the pandemic.
HostA: Dr. David Miller, the president, mentioned they had almost 300 Covid patients at one point.
HostB: Yeah, and 30% of those were in the ICU—that’s an intense load for any hospital to handle.
HostA: And he really emphasized the resilience of the employees, you know, working under that kind of stress without complaint.
HostB: It’s no surprise they ended up ranking second on Forbes’ list of America’s Best Large Employers for 2021.
HostA: Right? They provided ample protective gear and mental health resources, even a wellness app developed at the university.
HostB: And that $8,000 grant for employees who buy or renovate homes nearby—that’s a pretty unique benefit.
HostA: Oh, and that contact-tracing app, GuideSafe, developed by UAB faculty—hundreds of thousands used it around the country.
HostB: It’s interesting though, Amazon actually took the number one spot on that same Forbes list.
HostA: Yeah, with benefits like unlimited paid parental leave and up to $25,000 for fertility or adoption support.
HostB: They also offered meditation apps and education reimbursements for employees’ kids during the pandemic.
HostA: But you know, UAB wasn’t alone—Yale, University of Michigan, Ohio State’s medical center all made the top 20.
HostB: The survey was huge too—50,000 Americans rating their employers anonymously.
HostA: Makes you think about what really makes a workplace stand out during such a tough time.
HostB: For sure—it’s not just about pay, it’s about feeling supported, um, especially in healthcare or essential work.
